verses.text_ar: يسٓ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Ya Sin.

verses.text_ar: وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: By the wise Qur´an,

verses.text_ar: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! thou art of those sent

verses.text_ar: عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: On a straight path,

verses.text_ar: تَنزِيلَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: A revelation of the Mighty, the Merciful,

verses.text_ar: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَـٰفِلُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: That thou mayst warn a folk whose fathers were not warned, so they are heedless.

verses.text_ar: لَقَدْ حَقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Already hath the judgment, (for their infidelity) proved true of most of them, for they believe not.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِىٓ أَعْنَـٰقِهِمْ أَغْلَـٰلًا فَهِىَ إِلَى ٱلْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We have put on their necks carcans reaching unto the chins, so that they are made stiff-necked.

verses.text_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَـٰهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And We have set a bar before them and a bar behind them, and (thus) have covered them so that they see not.

verses.text_ar: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Whether thou warn them or thou warn them not, it is alike for them, for they believe not.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَخَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Thou warnest only him who followeth the Reminder and feareth the Beneficent in secret. To him bear tidings of forgiveness and a rich reward.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا۟ وَءَاثَـٰرَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَـٰهُ فِىٓ إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We it is Who bring the dead to life. We record that which they send before (them, and their footprints. And all things We have kept in a clear Register.

verses.text_ar: وَٱضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَآءَهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Coin for them a similitude: The people of the city when those sent (from Allah) came unto them;

verses.text_ar: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهِمُ ٱثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: When We sent unto them twain, and they denied them both, so We reinforced them with a third, and they said: Lo! we have been sent unto you.

verses.text_ar: قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They said: Ye are but mortals like unto us. The Beneficent hath naught revealed. Ye do but lie!

verses.text_ar: قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They answered: Our Lord knoweth that we are indeed sent unto you,

verses.text_ar: وَمَا عَلَيْنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And our duty is but plain conveyance (of the message).

verses.text_ar: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا۟ لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (The people of the city) said: We augur ill of you. If ye desist not, we shall surely stone you, and grievous torture will befall you at our hands.

verses.text_ar: قَالُوا۟ طَـٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّسْرِفُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They said: Your evil augury be with you! Is it because ye are reminded (of the truth)? Nay, but ye are froward folk!

verses.text_ar: وَجَآءَ مِنْ أَقْصَا ٱلْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And there came from the uttermost part of the city a man running. He cried: O my people! Follow those who have been sent!

verses.text_ar: ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ مَن لَّا يَسْـَٔلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Follow those who ask of you no fee, and who are rightly guided.

verses.text_ar: وَمَا لِىَ لَآ أَعْبُدُ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِى وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: For what cause should I not serve Him Who hath created me, and unto Whom ye will be brought back?

verses.text_ar: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Shall I take (other) gods in place of Him when, if the Beneficent should wish me any harm, their intercession will avail me naught, nor can they save?

verses.text_ar: إِنِّىٓ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Then truly I should be in error manifest.

verses.text_ar: إِنِّىٓ ءَامَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَٱسْمَعُونِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! I have believed in your Lord, so hear me!

verses.text_ar: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلِ ٱلْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَـٰلَيْتَ قَوْمِى يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: It was said (unto him): Enter paradise. He said: Would that my people knew

verses.text_ar: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِى رَبِّى وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: With what (munificence) my Lord hath pardoned me and made me of the honoured ones!

verses.text_ar: ۞ وَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ مِن جُندٍ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: We sent not down against his people after him a host from heaven, nor do We ever send.

verses.text_ar: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَـٰمِدُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: It was but one Shout, and lo! they were extinct.

verses.text_ar: يَـٰحَسْرَةً عَلَى ٱلْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Ah, the anguish for the bondmen! Never came there unto them a messenger but they did mock him!

verses.text_ar: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Have they not seen how many generations We destroyed before them, which indeed returned not unto them;

verses.text_ar: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: But all, without exception, will be brought before Us.

verses.text_ar: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ ٱلْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَـٰهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: A token unto them is the dead earth. We revive it, and We bring forth from it grain so that they eat thereof;

verses.text_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْعُيُونِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And We have placed therein gardens of the date-palm and grapes, and We have caused springs of water to gush forth therein,

verses.text_ar: لِيَأْكُلُوا۟ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: That they may eat of the fruit thereof, and their hands made it not. Will they not, then, give thanks?

verses.text_ar: سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْأَزْوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Glory be to Him Who created all the sexual pairs, of that which the earth groweth, and of themselves, and of that which they know not!

verses.text_ar: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: A token unto them is night. We strip it of the day, and lo! they are in darkness.

verses.text_ar: وَٱلشَّمْسُ تَجْرِى لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And the sun runneth on unto a resting-place for him. That is the measuring of the Mighty, the Wise.

verses.text_ar: وَٱلْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَـٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلْعُرْجُونِ ٱلْقَدِيمِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And for the moon We have appointed mansions till she return like an old shrivelled palm-leaf.

verses.text_ar: لَا ٱلشَّمْسُ يَنۢبَغِى لَهَآ أَن تُدْرِكَ ٱلْقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيْلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِى فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: It is not for the sun to overtake the moon, nor doth the night outstrip the day. They float each in an orbit.

verses.text_ar: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And a token unto them is that We bear their offspring in the laden ship,

verses.text_ar: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِۦ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And have created for them of the like thereof whereon they ride.

verses.text_ar: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And if We will, We drown them, and there is no help for them, neither can they be saved;

verses.text_ar: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَـٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Unless by mercy from Us and as comfort for a while.

verses.text_ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: When it is said unto them: Beware of that which is before you and that which is behind you, that haply ye may find mercy (they are heedless).

verses.text_ar: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍ مِّنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Never came a token of the tokens of their Lord to them, but they did turn away from it!

verses.text_ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُۥٓ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And when it is said unto them: Spend of that wherewith Allah hath provided you, those who disbelieve say unto those who believe: Shall we feed those whom Allah, if He willed, would feed? Ye are in naught else than error manifest.

verses.text_ar: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And they say: When will this promise be fulfilled, if ye are truthful?

verses.text_ar: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They await but one Shout, which will surprise them while they are disputing.

verses.text_ar: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Then they cannot make bequest, nor can they return to their own folk.

verses.text_ar: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And the trumpet is blown and lo! from the graves they hie unto their Lord,

verses.text_ar: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Crying: Woe upon us! Who hath raised us from our place of sleep? This is that which the Beneficent did promise, and the messengers spoke truth.

verses.text_ar: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: It is but one Shout, and behold them brought together before Us!

verses.text_ar: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: This day no soul is wronged in aught; nor are ye requited aught save what ye used to do.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى شُغُلٍ فَـٰكِهُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! those who merit paradise this day are happily employed,

verses.text_ar: هُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُهُمْ فِى ظِلَـٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They and their wives, in pleasant shade, on thrones reclining;

verses.text_ar: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Theirs the fruit (of their good deeds) and theirs (all) that they ask;

verses.text_ar: سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: The word from a Merciful Lord (for them) is: Peace!

verses.text_ar: وَٱمْتَـٰزُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: But avaunt ye, O ye guilty, this day!

verses.text_ar: ۞ أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Did I not charge you, O ye sons of Adam, that ye worship not the devil - Lo! he is your open foe! -

verses.text_ar: وَأَنِ ٱعْبُدُونِى ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: But that ye worship Me? That was the right path.

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Yet he hath led astray of you a great multitude. Had ye then no sense?

verses.text_ar: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: This is hell which ye were promised (if ye followed him).

verses.text_ar: ٱصْلَوْهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Burn therein this day for that ye disbelieved.

verses.text_ar: ٱلْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: This day We seal up their mouths, and their hands speak out to Us and their feet bear witness as to what they used to earn.

verses.text_ar: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَٱسْتَبَقُوا۟ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And had We willed, We verily could have quenched their eyesight so that they should struggle for the way. Then how could they have seen?

verses.text_ar: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And had We willed, We verily could have fixed them in their place, making them powerless to go forward or turn back.

verses.text_ar: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: He whom we bring unto old age, We reverse him in creation (making him go back to weakness after strength). Have ye then no sense?

verses.text_ar: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَـٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْءَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And We have not taught him (Muhammad) poetry, nor is it meet for him. This is naught else than a Reminder and a Lecture making plain,

verses.text_ar: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: To warn whosoever liveth, and that the word may be fulfilled against the disbelievers.

verses.text_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَـٰلِكُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Have they not seen how We have created for them of Our handiwork the cattle, so that they are their owners,

verses.text_ar: وَذَلَّلْنَـٰهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And have subdued them unto them, so that some of them they have for riding, some for food?

verses.text_ar: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Benefits and (divers) drinks have they from them. Will they not then give thanks?

verses.text_ar: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And they have taken (other) gods beside Allah, in order that they may be helped.

verses.text_ar: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: It is not in their power to help them; but they (the worshippers) are unto them a host in arms.

verses.text_ar: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: So let not their speech grieve thee (O Muhammad). Lo! We know what they conceal and what proclaim.

verses.text_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Hath not man seen that We have created him from a drop of seed? Yet lo! he is an open opponent.

verses.text_ar: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِىَ خَلْقَهُۥ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And he hath coined for Us a similitude, and hath forgotten the fact of his creation, saying: Who will revive these bones when they have rotted away?

verses.text_ar: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Say: He will revive them Who produced them at the first, for He is Knower of every creation,

verses.text_ar: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Who hath appointed for you fire from the green tree, and behold! ye kindle from it.

verses.text_ar: أَوَلَيْسَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the like of them? Aye, that He is! for He is the All-Wise Creator,

verses.text_ar: إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيْـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: But His command, when He intendeth a thing, is only that He saith unto it: Be! and it is.

verses.text_ar: فَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Therefor Glory be to Him in Whose hand is the dominion over all things! Unto Him ye will be brought back.
